Just got threw playing all the tutorial and the first level. I'm 33, so i remember all the old ones, whichever is the one with the school is my most memorable. Graphics aren't bad....textures are though. Its fun. I enjoyed the 1 1/2 hour i played it and don't regret my purchase so far. LOTS to unlock, and the level creator (and ability to play other's levels) will keep this game fresh for a while.

WRITING.TITLE: how to delete an xbox console from the xbox app on windows 10
WRITING.TEXT: ok, so i've had to do an advanced repair on my xbox that was previously connected to my xbox app on windows 10. I sent that console back, and have my new console, however, the windows 10 xbox app remembers the old console in the list, and i cannot choose to delete it, because i have to connect to it first, which i cant, cuz i sent it back. any clue on how to delete it? thanks in advance!
i have, and a few others....not one response
